game.name: Bunnies Huddled Together
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 불규칙한 조각과 아름다운 토끼 일러스트가 포함된 흥미로운 퍼즐 게임입니다. 이 게임으로 휴식을 취해보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An interesting jigsaw puzzle game with irregular pieces featuring beautiful rabbit illustrations. Come and relax with this game!

reviewHighlights.text: I really enjoyed this game! The variety of puzzles is great, the music sounds amazing, and the game itself is very fun to play. I definitely recommend...
This game was super cute and chat loved it when I streamed this game.
